long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gadfly Chat is an extension that enables real-time communication between you and other Gadfly users browsing the same content.

Create a shared experience with anyone, anywhere. 

Activating the extension will create a chat window bound to the url of the current tab, allowing you to send and receive messages with other Gadly users viewing the same page.
